H0.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own sister. Sistercide

H1.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own sister. Fratricidesis

H2.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own sister. Siblicide

H3.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own sister. Sororicide

A4.text: Sororicide (from Latin sororicidium; from soror 'sister' and -cÄ«dium 'killing') is the act of murdering one's own sister.
